mouserun.game

Class GameUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • mouserun.game.GameUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class GameUI is the Game Interface of the game. It uses standard JFrame etc components in this implementation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • GameUI

        public GameUI(java.lang.String id,
              int ancho,
              int alto,
              int mQuesos,
              int tiempo,
              int bombasM,
              ContenedorLaberinto cont,
              GestorSuscripciones ge,
              jade.content.lang.Codec co,
              jade.content.onto.Ontology ont,
              jade.content.ContentManager ma)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates an instance of the GameUI.
        Parameters:
        id - Identificador de la partida
        ancho - Ancho del laberinto
        alto - Alto del laberinto
        mQuesos - Objetivo de quesos a lograr en la partida
        tiempo - Tiempo maximo de la partida
        bombasM - Bombas maximas que puede colocar un raton
        cont - Estyructura de control del laberinto
        ge - Gestor de uscripciones
        co - Codec
        ont - Ontologia del laberinto
        ma - Content Manager
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - An IOException can occur when the required game assets are missing.
        java.lang.InterruptedException
